name: Superdice
description:
There is a bug where the game makes you insta-win sometimes, just reload the page. We will fix it once the rating period is over.

SuperDice 101

Defeat 5 enemies using the power of dice.

Your ATTACK damage is influenced by the dice.

DEFEND to get JUICE, which you can spend on HEALING or SUPERDICE, which is a powerful attack.

The Team

+ Totally [Art | Design]
